alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Delaware; Franklin; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL CHAMPAIGN COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, NORTHWESTERN FRANKLIN, SOUTHWESTERN DELAWARE AND SOUTHERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 552 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over North Lewisburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Delaware, Marysville, Powell, North Lewisburg, New California, Milford Center, Shawnee Hills, Ostrander, Woodstock, Unionville Center, Bellepoint, Warrensburg, Watkins, Pottersburg, Columbus Zoo and New Dover. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
